sense.name: act of keeping
sense.commentary: HOLDINGS[+event] retention, keeping, holding - the act of keeping in your possession
sense.examples: His holding of the pictures left them crumpled and sticky. The holding of the candies for too long will melt them.

sense.name: thing kept
sense.commentary: property, belongings, holding, material possession - something owned; any tangible or intangible possession that is owned by someone
sense.examples: His holdings at this bank add up to several million dollars. He gave all of his land holdings to his eldest son.
